<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=3,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=315261,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KN13302A.;11',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<!-- THIS IS THE END OF A COMPOSITION COMPONENT -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_ko13302_1_3"> </A>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko13302_program_management_agreement"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko13302_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>PROGRAM MANAGEMENT AGREEMENT    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS PROGRAM MANAGEMENT AGREEMENT (AMENDS AND RESTATES THE PREVIOUS "UMBRELLA AGREEMENT" DATED FEBRUARY&nbsp;15, 2007 WHICH IS HEREBY TERMINATED AND HAS NO
FURTHER EFFECT) (this "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") is made and entered into as of September&nbsp;19, 2007 (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Effective
Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") by and among Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation, having an office and place of business at 1225&nbsp;17<SUP>th</SUP>&nbsp;Street
Suite&nbsp;1300, Denver, Colorado, 80202 ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Evergreen</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), and Bechtel Power Corporation, a Nevada corporation having an office and place of business at
5275&nbsp;Westview Drive, Frederick, MD 21703-8306 (hereinafter "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Bechtel</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). Evergreen and Bechtel may be referred to herein individually
as a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>party</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" and collectively as the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>parties</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>". </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko13302_witnesseth_"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko13302_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>WITNESSETH:    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, Evergreen owns and operates the Ft. Union K-Fuel&reg; plant and an adjacent coal mine in Wyoming (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Existing Plant</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") which is the first commercial plant producing refined coal using Evergreen's K- Fuel&reg; patented process to
transform high moisture, low-Btu coals into more efficient, lower-emission fuel (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>K- Fuel</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&reg; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>process</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Evergreen anticipates building standardized mine mouth and K-Direct (</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>i.e.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, located at a power plant) refining
facilities using its K- Fuel&reg; process (each such facility, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Plant</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" and collectively, the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Plants</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") for which Evergreen will engage Bechtel to perform the engineering, procurement and construction services for the initial projects having
aggregate capital costs of at least one billion dollars ($1&nbsp;billion) (such Plants or their replacements, collectively, the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Identified Plants</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Evergreen desires to utilize Bechtel's services on an integrated basis to oversee both technical development and implementation of all new facilities (the Evergreen's Capital
Programs); </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Evergreen is seeking a contractor with experience in the engineering, procurement and construction of integrated coal-fired power plants and coal processing
facilities in order to perform engineering, procurement and construction services (collectively, the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>EPC Services</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") in connection with the Identified
Plants; </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Bechtel is experienced in providing such EPC Services and desires to provide such EPC Services to Evergreen; </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Evergreen desires Bechtel to support the development of, and business development efforts for, Evergreen projects; </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Evergreen desires that Bechtel support the technical development of the standard plant offering for K-Fuel&reg; (and K-Direct) facilities; </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Bechtel has entered into that certain Services Agreement, dated as of September&nbsp;21, 2006 (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>TSA</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), with Evergreen to
provide (1)&nbsp;technical services, construction management and project management services thereunder in connection with the Existing Plant and (2)&nbsp;business development support, scope book
design and technical services towards a standard plant design of the Identified Plants (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>TSA Services</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Bechtel has entered into that certain Loaned Employee Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2007 (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Loaned Employee
Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), with Evergreen to provide personnel to work under Evergreen's direction at the Existing Plant; </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
Evergreen will engage Bechtel to perform Program Management Services in order to manage and oversee the standardized plant initiatives; </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties desire to reflect the basis of their mutual understanding and intention to proceed together on a mutually exclusive basis with the development of the scope of the
EPC Services to be performed in connection with each of the Identified Plants and the execution of engineering, </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=31208,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302A.;9',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_4"> </A>
<BR>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>procurement
and construction agreements (each, an "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>EPC Contract</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") for each of the Identified Plants; and </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties desire to agree to certain matters common to the TSA, the Loaned Employee Agreement and the EPC Contracts. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, for and in consideration of these premises and the agreements herein contained, the parties, intending to be legally bound, mutually covenant and agree as follows: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE I&#151;DEDICATED PROGRAM MANAGEMENT TEAM  </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>1.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive Sponsors.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each of the parties hereby appoints the following individual, respectively, as its Executive Sponsor (each, an "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Executive
Sponsor</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") to establish the strategy and objectives for the work at the Existing Plant and the development and execution of the Identified Plants: </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><TABLE WIDTH="65%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="15%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="82%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Kevin Collins; and</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="15%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="82%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Jeffry Brightman.</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
party may replace its Executive Sponsor by notice to the other party designating the new Executive Sponsor. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>1.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Program Management Team.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties shall establish a Program Management Team comprised of one representative of each party appointed in accordance with Section&nbsp;1.3 below to
provide strategic direction and to set priorities consistent with the direction provided by the Executive Sponsors. Decisions of the Program Management Team will be by consensus. Failure to reach a
consensus by the Program Management Team within ten (10)&nbsp;days will require the decision to be escalated to the Executive Sponsors for consideration and resolution. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Program Management Team will oversee the development of the standard plant, technology modifications and testing, and execution of studies for K-Fuel&reg; and
K-Direct plants. Planning and structuring to facilitate multiple plant equipment purchases and other synergies amongst the K-Fuel&reg;/K-Direct plants to be
built will be implemented by the Program Management Team. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>1.3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Representatives.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each of the parties hereby appoints the following individual, respectively, as its initial representative to the Program Management Team (each, a
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Representative</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"): </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><TABLE WIDTH="65%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="15%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="82%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Steve Wolff; and</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="15%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="82%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>William R. Elliott.</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
party may replace its Representative by notice to the other party designating the new Representative, provided that Bechtel will obtain the approval of Evergreen's Executive Sponsor
(which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed) to any replacement of its Representative. </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.3.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
Representatives shall have the power to delegate authority to such employees, agents, subcontractors and representatives as they may from time to time deem appropriate.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.3.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
Representatives shall hold regular meetings (including by means of telephone conference) at such times, dates and places as the Representatives may determine. Special meetings
of the Representatives may be called by any Representative upon reasonable advance notice. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=5,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=611083,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302A.;9',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_5"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
</UL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>1.4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Dedicated Personnel.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bechtel and its affiliates shall make available and maintain staff that are dedicated to fulfillment of its obligations under this Agreement, the TSA, the Loaned
Employee Agreement, any EPC Contract that is executed and any other agreement between the parties or their respective affiliates with respect to the Existing Plant or the Identified Plants
(collectively, the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Program Documents</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). Such personnel shall have the technical and managerial expertise to manage and execute the TSA Services and the
EPC Services in accordance with the requirements of the Program Documents, including key staff members for the management of the EPC Services both on and off-site who shall be supported by
area and discipline superintendents and personnel as required. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE II&#151;PROGRAM MANAGEMENT TEAM RESPONSIBILITIES  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Responsibilities.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties, through their respective Representatives, shall work jointly to fully define their respective rights and obligations, including the TSA Services and
the EPC Services to be provided by Bechtel with respect to the work at the Existing Plant and the development and execution of the Identified Plants. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Rights to Use Work Product and Intellectual Property Rights.  </I></FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.2.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>As
used herein, "Work Product" shall refer collectively to all drawings, specifications, reports, studies, analyses, recommendations, estimates, data and other documents prepared
in the performance of the services and/or delivered to Evergreen under this Agreement, whether in written or electronic form. Intellectual property required for the K-Fuel&reg;
process shall be, and remain the property of Evergreen ("Evergreen Intellectual Property"). Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, the intellectual property related to the
engineering, procurement and construction process, as well as the intellectual property developed and/or delivered in the performance of the services shall be, and remain the property of Bechtel
("Bechtel Intellectual Property") regardless of whether it is reflected in the Work Product. Unless payment has not been properly made to Bechtel, the Work Product is the property of Evergreen,
subject to the following restriction; Evergreen covenants not to reproduce, distribute, display, perform, create derivative works from or otherwise use (except as otherwise provided in 2.2.2) any
Bechtel Intellectual Property without the prior written approval of Bechtel.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.2.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Notwithstanding
the foregoing Section&nbsp;2.2.1, in the event Evergreen, or a third party licensee, awards an agreement to perform EPC Service to another contractor as permitted
by the terms of this Agreement, and desires to furnish the Process Flow Diagrams ("PFDs") or Piping&nbsp;&amp; Instrumentation Diagrams ("P&amp;IDs"), Evergreen shall be entitled to furnish the PFDs and
P&amp;IDs to the contractor providing such services to Evergreen ("Other Contractor") provided that, prior to such disclosure to the Other Contractor Evergreen provides Bechtel with a confidentiality and
release agreement in the form of Exhibit&nbsp;A attached hereto executed by each recipient of any PFD or P&amp;ID agreeing that such recipient is not relying and will not rely upon such PFD or P&amp;ID and
waiving and releasing any claims it may have against Bechtel or any of its affiliates on account of such reliance or purported reliance. In no event will Bechtel have any liability to such recipient
or any other third party for the use of any PFD or P&amp;ID furnished by Evergreen and Evergreen shall defend, indemnify and hold Bechtel harmless against any liability (including reasonable attorneys'
fees and court costs) for any consequences or such use by such recipients. Evergreen shall be responsible for the breach by any such recipient of its confidentiality obligations. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>5</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=6,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=256785,FOLIO='5',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302A.;9',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_6"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.2.3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Indemnification</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bechtel Intellectual Property, may not be used by Evergreen for any purpose other than in connection
with the construction, operation, maintenance, and repair of the Identified Plants. To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Evergreen, if it so uses, or allows others to use, such Bechtel
Intellectual Property and/or Work Product prepared and/or delivered in the performance of the services for any purpose other than as stated in this Agreement, shall defend, indemnify and hold Bechtel
harmless from third party claims arising therefrom. To the extent any Bechtel Intellectual Property and/or Work Product is modified by Evergreen or at Evergreen's request, then Evergreen shall defend,
indemnify and hold Bechtel harmless from third party claims arising therefrom.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.2.4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel
Work Product may not be disclosed by Evergreen to a third party except as specifically permitted in this agreement. It is agreed by the parties that any detailed design
based on site specific information shall be maintained in confidence by Evergreen and not disclosed to any third party. Prior to Evergreen making any permitted disclosure of Bechtel Work Product to
third parties Evergreen shall provide Bechtel a confidentiality and release agreement in the form of Exhibit&nbsp;A attached hereto, executed by each recipient of any Bechtel Work Product agreeing
that such recipient is not relying and will not rely upon such Work Product and waiving and releasing any claims it may have against Bechtel or any of its affiliates on account of any such reliance or
purported reliance. In no event will Bechtel have any liability to such recipient or any other third party for the use of any Work Product furnished by Bechtel or any portion thereof or information
contained therein and Evergreen shall defend, indemnify and hold Bechtel harmless against any liability (including reasonable attorneys' fees and court costs) for any consequence of such use by such
recipients. Evergreen shall be responsible for the breach by any such recipient of its confidentiality obligations. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Standard Plant Program.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is recognized that the overall objectives with respect to the Identified Plants (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Standard Plant
Objectives</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") are as set out below: (a)&nbsp;Bechtel to develop PFD's for a standardized plant ("Standard Plant Basic Design") (b)&nbsp;Bechtel to develop additional
detailed design materials for a standardized plant ("Standard Plant Detailed Design") (c)&nbsp;optimization of plant operation and performance; (d)&nbsp;standardization of equipment supply across
all Identified Plants; (e)&nbsp;standardization of operation and maintenance practices across all Identified Plants; (f)&nbsp;Bechtel will use the lessons learned from previously executed
Identified Plants for which it was engaged as well as its current technology resources in enhancing the execution of an EPC Contract; and (g)&nbsp;maximum enhancement of the schedule for
engineering, procurement, construction and completion of each Identified Plant for which Bechtel is engaged to perform EPC Services. This Standard Plant Detailed Design will be the design materials of
a level of specificity included in a standard preliminary scope book. In the course of performance of the TSA Services and the EPC Services, Bechtel shall use commercially reasonable efforts to assist
Evergreen in the realization of the Standard Plant Objectives and shall plan and execute its TSA Services and EPC Services so as to ensure the realization of the Standard Plant Objectives to the
maximum practical extent. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;TSA Phase.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties through their Representatives shall perform the following activities under the TSA with respect to the Existing Plant and the development of the
Identified Plants (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>TSA Phase</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"): </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.4.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel
will work with Evergreen to optimize the operations of the Existing Plant. The modifications, testing and demonstration of the Existing Plant will provide the basis for the
design for the Identified Plants; and </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>6</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=7,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=984788,FOLIO='6',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302B.;15',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_7"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.4.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel
will provide technical support (related to the EPC Services and the future EPC Contracts) to Evergreen in its preparation of studies for K-Fuel&reg;
users during Evergreen sales efforts.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.4.3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>On
a Task Order basis, Bechtel will develop PFD's for use as the Standard Plant Basic Design.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.4.4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>On
a Task Order basis, Bechtel will develop additional drawings, specifications, reports, studies, analyses, recommendations, estimates, data and other documents suitable to be
Issued for Review ("IFR") for use as the Standard Plant Detailed Design. It is the intent of the parties that the Standard Plant Detailed Design will include Bechtel Intellectual Property and may </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B><I>not</I></B></FONT><FONT
SIZE=2> be disclosed by Evergreen without the prior written approval of Bechtel. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Scope Book Phase.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Scope Book Phase shall not be finalized until the successful demonstration test of the Existing Plant (as agreed by the parties in Section&nbsp;2.4.1) has
been completed. The parties through their Representatives shall perform the following activities under the TSA with respect to the finalization of certain terms for each of the Identified Plants
("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Scope Book Phase</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"): </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
shall provide the process design and the design and supply of certain proprietary equipment;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on the modifications, testing and demonstration of the Existing Plant during the TSA Phase, Bechtel shall develop the design criteria for the balance of the Identified Plants
(with the exception of Sasol-Lurgi equipment);
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>A
detailed project definition for the Identified Plants will be created during this stage. Basic engineering will be executed and detailed cost and schedule estimates generated.
The project definition will be optimized for the selected scope of EPC work by refining it and developing the project schedule, the project cost estimate and the project execution plan and all aspects
of the project, resulting in a Scope Book to be delivered at the end of the Scope Book Phase;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties agree that the pricing for the EPC Services shall be developed and agreed through an open book process and that the compensation terms under the EPC Contracts for each
of the Identified Plants shall be on a unit rate, reimbursable cost basis with a service fee (to the extent practical, some subsystems or unit operations may be purchased on a fixed price basis, for
example, silos, packaged boilers, or water purification systems may fit into this category);
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel
and Evergreen shall, through the open book process, develop and agree upon the scope of work, pricing and related schedules for each of the Identified Plants, in each case
taking into account all relevant factors including costs for subcontractor purchase orders, on-site environmental conditions, topographical features of the site, permit requirements and
any existing infrastructure or facilities;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.6.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Bechtel
shall negotiate and execute purchase orders and agreements for equipment, materials and services (other than those for which Evergreen is responsible) either as agent for
Evergreen or, subject to Evergreen providing adequate security for any financial obligations which may become payable to such vendors, in Bechtel's own name. In the event of cancellation or
termination of Bechtel, payment obligations for all agreements made in Bechtel's own name will automatically be assigned to, and accepted by Evergreen; </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>7</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=8,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=165601,FOLIO='7',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302B.;15',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_8"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.7.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties shall agree upon a preliminary Scope Book and confirm their agreement in writing;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.8.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties shall agree upon and finalize the EPC Contracts in the form of Exhibit&nbsp;B for each of the Identified Plants; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>and</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.5.9.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties will seek their respective corporate approvals for entering into the EPC Contracts with respect to each of the Identified Plants. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;EPC Contract Phase.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the other provisions of this Agreement, the parties, through their Representatives, shall enter into EPC Contracts in the form of Exhibit&nbsp;B to
this Agreement. The parties shall additionally coordinate with respect to the timing and schedule for the Notice to Commence Construction with respect to each executed EPC Contract
("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>EPC Phase</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). During the EPC Phase Bechtel will perform detailed engineering, procurement and construction of the Identified Plants. The Notice to
Commence Construction for a Plant will not be issued until satisfaction of the following conditions precedent: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
Existing Plant demonstration of capabilities will have been performed to the satisfaction of both Parties and incorporated into the design during the completed Scope Book
Phase;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties shall agree upon the final Scope Book, which will include site specific details, and confirm their agreement in writing;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
shall have cleared the Identified Plant site of all hazardous substances which may exist on, above or under the Identified Plant site;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
shall have provided the Identified Plant site to Bechtel, all necessary rights of access thereto and egress therefrom, and off-site rights of way and easement
as necessary for execution of the project;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
shall have secured all permits which are designated as the responsibility of Evergreen in the permit matrix to be developed during the Scope Book Phase and which are
required to be secured prior to commencement of construction on the Identified Plant site;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.6.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
shall have paid all amounts which may have become due to Bechtel under the TSA, the Loaned Employee Agreement, the EPC Contract or this Agreement;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.7.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
shall have obtained releases and indemnities acceptable to Bechtel from the owner(s) of the other facilities on or adjacent to the site, by which Bechtel shall be
released from any liability arising out of or in connection with loss or damage to such facilities, including consequential damages; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.6.8.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
items that have been identified during the TSA Phase or the Scope Book Phase that the parties have mutually agreed in the applicable EPC Contract are conditions precedent to
construction, have been completed. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2.7.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Delays.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each party shall promptly notify the other party as to any conditions arising which are likely to cause delays in the completion of a particular item of TSA
Services or EPC Services, its anticipated duration, and such party's proposed remedial action. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=6,SEQ=9,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=381316,FOLIO='8',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302B.;15',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_9"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE III&#151;BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.1</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties shall cooperate to support Bechtel's business development efforts to include the K- Fuel&reg; process in EPC/CM proposals for plants that burn low rank
coals where Bechtel, in its sole discretion, desires to include such offering. When Bechtel is submitting a proposal on a sole source basis and desires to include the K- Fuel&reg;
process in such proposal, Evergreen will work with Bechtel to incorporate the K- Fuel&reg; process into an offering that meets the customer's particular needs. During the term of
this Agreement, when Bechtel is submitting a proposal on a competitive basis, Evergreen will work with Bechtel exclusively during the bidding phase to provide a proposal that includes the
K- Fuel&reg; process.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.2</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
parties shall cooperate to support Evergreen's business development efforts to promote and/or license the K-Fuel&reg; process and product to third parties.
Evergreen may, on a task order basis, utilize Bechtel and Bechtel affiliate resources for assistance in providing financial modeling tools.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.3</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>At
such time as Evergreen is submitting a proposal to a third party licensee Evergreen shall work solely with Bechtel to provide a proposal for contemplated EPC Services in connection
with the proposed license. Evergreen shall utilize reasonable efforts to assure that Bechtel is provided the opportunity to perform the engineering, procurement and construction of plants constructed
by third party licensees. If the first Evergreen plant to be constructed is constructed by a third party licensee, Evergreen shall ensure that the third party licensee utilizes Bechtel for the
engineering, procurement and construction services of such plant. </FONT></DD></DL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE IV&#151;TERM AND TERMINATION  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>4.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Term.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as expressly set forth in this Agreement, the terms and conditions of this Agreement shall be in full force and effect from the date hereof until the
earlier to occur of (a)&nbsp;the termination of this Agreement by Evergreen pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2; (b)&nbsp;the termination of this Agreement by Bechtel pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.3;
and (c)&nbsp;execution of the EPC Contract for the last of the Identified Plants. Except for the provisions of this Agreement that expressly survive the termination of this Agreement, upon execution
of the EPC Contract for any Plant, this Agreement shall cease to apply with respect to that Plant and the parties' respective rights, obligations and liabilities with respect to the EPC Services for
that Plant shall be exclusively governed by the terms of such EPC Contract. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>4.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Evergreen Termination.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evergreen shall have the right, exercisable at any time upon written notice to Bechtel, to terminate this Agreement. Such notice of termination shall be treated
as contemporaneous notice of termination of the TSA and the Loaned Employee Agreement and any termination of the TSA shall be treated as a contemporaneous notice of termination of this Agreement. In
the event of a termination of this Agreement, Evergreen shall within thirty (30)&nbsp;days thereafter, make payment to Bechtel of the amounts due under Section&nbsp;9.3 of the TSA, the Loaned
Employee Agreement and Section&nbsp;5.2 of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>4.3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Bechtel Termination.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bechtel shall have the right, exercisable at any time upon written notice to Evergreen, to terminate this Agreement. Such notice of termination shall not be
treated as a notice of termination of the TSA or the Loaned Employee Agreement, provided that any termination of the TSA by Bechtel pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.4 of the TSA shall be treated as a
contemporaneous notice of termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>9</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<A NAME="page_ko13302_1_10"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE V&#151;EXCLUSIVITY AND TERMINATION FEE  </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>5.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Exclusivity.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evergreen covenants and agrees that during the term of this Agreement, none of Evergreen or its affiliates will engage, or agree to engage, or participate in any
discussions with any other contractor regarding the engagement of, any contractor other than Bechtel or one of its affiliates to provide EPC Services or to act in the role of an engineering,
procurement or construction contractor with respect to the Identified Plants. For the avoidance of doubt, the parties acknowledge that Bechtel's scope or work for the Identified Plants will not
include: (i)&nbsp;procurement of the processor equipment to be obtained from Lurgi South Africa (Pty)&nbsp;Ltd.; and (ii)&nbsp;process design, both of which will be provided by Evergreen (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Owner-Provided Procurement and Design</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). The parties agree that Identified Plants will have an
aggregate capital cost of at least one billion dollars ($1&nbsp;billion) and shall include the first Plant to be developed by Evergreen after the Existing Plant. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>5.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Termination Fee.  </I></FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.2.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>In
the event that Evergreen terminates this Agreement under Section&nbsp;4.2, Evergreen shall automatically become liable to make payment to Bechtel of a termination fee (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Termination Fee</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") in the amount listed below:
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.2.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>In
the event that during the term of this Agreement Evergreen breaches its obligations of exclusivity set forth in Section&nbsp;5.1, then this Agreement shall automatically be
deemed to have been terminated by Evergreen pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2 and Evergreen shall automatically become liable to make payment to Bechtel of a Termination Fee in the amount listed below:
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.2.3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Additionally,
in the event that Evergreen or an Evergreen affiliate, has not entered into agreements with Bechtel or a Bechtel affiliate to perform EPC Services for Identified
Plants with an aggregate capital cost of at least one billion dollars ($1&nbsp;billion) by December&nbsp;31, 2013, then this Agreement shall automatically be deemed to have been terminated by
Evergreen pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2 and Evergreen shall automatically become liable to make payment to Bechtel of a Termination Fee in the amount listed below: </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
<BR>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.2.4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>This
Section&nbsp;5.2 shall survive termination of this Agreement. For the avoidance of doubt, the parties acknowledge that if Evergreen terminates this Agreement (or is deemed
to have terminated this Agreement) under Section&nbsp;4.2, then Evergreen shall be obligated to pay only a single Termination Fee in the amount listed above which correlates with the amount of
aggregate capital costs of Identified Plants for which Bechtel has been paid.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.2.5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>For
the avoidance of doubt, if Bechtel terminates this Agreement for any reason other than a material breach of the Agreement by Evergreen, then Evergreen shall not be liable to
Bechtel for the appropriate Termination Fee above. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>10</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=8,SEQ=11,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=669986,FOLIO='10',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KO13302B.;15',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;13:29' -->
<UL>
<UL>
</UL>
</UL>
<!-- THIS IS THE END OF A COMPOSITION COMPONENT -->

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_kp13302_1_11"> </A>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->


 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE VI&#151;ASSIGNMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Neither this Agreement nor any rights, duties or obligations hereunder may be assigned in whole or in part by either party without the express written consent of
the other and any such purported assignment without such written consent shall be null and void. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE VII&#151;NOTICES  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All notices or other communications provided for or required by this Agreement ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Notices</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") shall be in writing and
shall be effective upon receipt given to the following addresses: </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><TABLE WIDTH="80%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="19%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>To Company:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="79%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen&nbsp;Inc.<BR>
1225 17<SUP>th</SUP>&nbsp;Street Suite&nbsp;1300,<BR>
Denver, Colorado, 80202<BR>
Attention: Executive Vice President&#151;Engineering<BR>
With a simultaneous copy to: General Counsel</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="19%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
To Contractor:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="79%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Bechtel Power Corporation<BR>
5275 Westview Drive<BR>
Frederick, MD 21703-8306<BR>
Attention: William R. Elliott<BR>
With a simultaneous copy to: Principal Counsel, Bechtel Power Corporation</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
Notices shall be given by (1)&nbsp;personal delivery or by electronic communication with a confirmation copy sent by mail, return receipt requested or (2)&nbsp;by registered or
certified mail, return receipt requested. All Notices shall be effective and shall be deemed delivered (i)&nbsp;if by personal delivery on the date of delivery, (ii)&nbsp;if by electronic
communication on the next business day following transmittal, and (iii)&nbsp;if solely by mail on the date of actual receipt. Company or Contractor may change its address for notice from time to
time by so notifying the other in accordance with this Article. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE VIII&#151;MISCELLANEOUS  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Entire Agreement.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement and Exhibits hereunder incorporated herein, together with the TSA, the Loaned Employee Agreement and the Confidentiality Agreement described in
Section&nbsp;8.10 below, constitute the entire Agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof as of the date first above shown. With the exception of the TSA, the Loaned
Employee Agreement and the Confidentiality Agreement, this Agreement shall supersede all previous specifications, proposals, representations, understandings, negotiations and letters of intent, oral
or written, expressed or implied, with respect to the subject matter hereof between the parties hereto or their representatives. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Equitable Adjustments.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that any of the provisions, or portions or applications thereof, of this Agreement are held to be unenforceable or invalid by a court of competent
jurisdiction, Evergreen and Bechtel shall negotiate an equitable adjustment in the provision(s) of this Agreement with a view toward effecting the purpose of this Agreement and the validity and
enforceability of the remaining provisions, or portions or applications thereof, shall not be affected thereby. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendments.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may not be changed, altered, modified, or amended, except by a written amendment executed by both parties. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>11</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=500686,FOLIO='11',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KP13302A.;11',USER='MBRADT',CD='21-MAR-2008;18:08' -->
<A NAME="page_kp13302_1_12"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Binding Nature.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties and their respective successors and permitted assigns. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.5.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Headings.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Article and Section headings are for purposes of reference only and shall not control or otherwise affect the information set forth therein. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.6.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Governing Law.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, but otherwise without giving effect to principles of
conflicts of law. This Section&nbsp;8.6 shall survive the termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.7.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Management Negotiations.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any disputes arising under this Agreement (each, a "Dispute") that are not resolved between Evergreen and Bechtel within ten (10)&nbsp;business days after
receipt by either party from the other party of a notice of such Dispute, shall be referred by either Evergreen's or Bechtel's Representative to the Executive Sponsors of Evergreen and Bechtel for
resolution. If such Executive Sponsors, negotiating in good faith, fail to reach an agreement within a reasonable period of time, not exceeding twenty (20)&nbsp;days after such referral, then either
Evergreen or Bechtel may bring a claim pursuant to the terms of Section&nbsp;8.8 below. This Section&nbsp;8.7 shall survive the termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.8.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Mediation/Arbitration of Disputes.  </I></FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>8.8.1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Mediation</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Dispute is not resolved within thirty (30)&nbsp;days after delivery of the notice of Dispute, then
either Party may give notice to the other referring the Dispute to mediation and the Parties shall endeavour to settle the Dispute by mediation. The Parties shall endeavour to agree upon a mediator
within ten (10)&nbsp;days after such referral, failing which, the mediator shall be appointed by the New York office of JAMS. The mediation shall be conducted in New York unless the Parties agree
otherwise, and shall be administered by JAMS pursuant to the rules and procedures of JAMS. At least one representative of each Party with the authority to settle the Dispute shall be present at the
mediation.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>8.8.2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Arbitration</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Parties are unable to settle the Dispute within ninety (90)&nbsp;days after delivery of the
notice of Dispute, the Dispute shall be finally settled by arbitration by one or more arbitrators appointed in accordance with the rules of JAMS. The arbitration proceedings shall be held at New York.
Any award entered by the arbitrator(s) shall be final, binding and nonappealable and judgment may be entered thereon by either Party in accordance with applicable law in any court of competent
jurisdiction. This arbitration provision shall be specifically enforceable.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>8.8.3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Expenses</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless otherwise directed by the arbitrator, each Party shall be responsible for its own expenses relating to
the conduct of the mediation and/or arbitration (including reasonable attorneys' fees and expenses) and shall share the fees of JAMS equally. This Section&nbsp;8.8 shall survive the termination of
this Agreement. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.9.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Third Party Beneficiaries.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The provisions of this Agreement are intended for the sole benefit of Evergreen and Bechtel and there are no third-party beneficiaries hereof. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>12</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=13,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="2",CHK=698182,FOLIO='12',FILE='DISK130:[08ZAG2.08ZAG13302]KP13302A.;11',USER='MBRADT',CD='21-MAR-2008;18:08' -->
<A NAME="page_kp13302_1_13"> </A>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.10.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Confidentiality.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All information provided pursuant to this Agreement by or on behalf of a party, its affiliates or its representatives to the other party or its affiliates or
representatives shall be governed by that certain Confidentiality Agreement, dated August&nbsp;11, 2006, by and between Bechtel and Evergreen (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Confidentiality
Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). This Section&nbsp;8.10 shall survive the termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.11.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;No Waiver.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as expressly provided to the contrary herein, any failure by either party at any time to enforce or require the strict keeping and performance by the other
party of any of the terms and conditions of this Agreement shall not constitute a waiver by such party of the particular term or condition, and shall, under no circumstances, affect or impair the
right of such party (a)&nbsp;thereafter to enforce or require performance of such term or condition or (b)&nbsp;thereafter to avail itself of any remedy provided under this Agreement which it may
have for any breach of such term or condition. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.12.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Further Assurances.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evergreen and Bechtel will each use its reasonable efforts to implement the provisions of this Agreement, and for such purpose each, at the reasonable request of
the other, will, without further consideration, promptly execute and deliver or cause to be executed and delivered to the other such assistance, or assignments, consents or other instruments in
addition to those required by this Agreement, in form and substance satisfactory to the other, as the other may reasonably deem necessary or desirable to implement any provision of this Agreement. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.13.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Independent Contractor.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bechtel is an independent contractor, and nothing contained herein shall be construed as constituting any relationship with Evergreen other than that of owner and
independent contractor, or as creating any relationship whatsoever between Evergreen and Bechtel's employees. Except as may be expressly provided otherwise in the Loaned Employee Agreement, neither
Bechtel nor any of its employees is or shall be deemed to be an employee of Evergreen. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.14.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Counterparts.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may be executed in counterparts, and any party hereto may execute any such counterpart, each of which when executed and delivered shall be deemed
to be an original and all of which counterparts taken together shall constitute but one and the same instrument. This Agreement shall become effective when each party hereto shall have received a
counterpart hereof signed by the other parties hereto. The parties agree that the delivery of this Agreement may be affected by means of an exchange of facsimile signatures with original copies to
follow by mail or courier service. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>8.15.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Consequential Damages.  </I></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In no event shall either party be liable to the other party, whether in contract, in tort (including, but not limited to, negligence and strict liability), under
any warranty, or otherwise, for any indirect, incidental, special or consequential loss or damages (including, but not limited to loss of profits, loss of interest or other financing charges or loss
of use). For the avoidance of doubt, the parties acknowledge that this Section&nbsp;8.15 shall not affect Evergreen's liability for payment of the applicable Termination Fee under this Agreement.
This Section&nbsp;8.15 shall survive the termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>[The
remainder of this page is intentionally left blank.] </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>13</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<A NAME="page_kp13302_1_14"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have caused this Agreement to be executed by their duly authorized officers as of the date first above written. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;12.1  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ma13302_ratio_of_earnings_to_fixed_charges"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ma13302_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>RATIO OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Our earnings were insufficient to cover fixed charges for each of the periods presented. Accordingly, the following table sets forth the deficiency of earnings to
fixed charges for each of the periods presented. Because of the deficiency, ratio information is not applicable. </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->

<TD WIDTH="2%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2 ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><HR NOSHADE SIZE=4></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2 ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><HR NOSHADE SIZE=4></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2 ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><HR NOSHADE SIZE=4></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For
purposes of computing the deficiency of earnings available to cover fixed charges, fixed charges represent interest expense, the portion of operating lease rental expense that is
considered by us to be representative of interest and amortization of discount related to indebtedness. Deficiency of earnings consists of loss before income taxes, plus fixed charges. </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>SUBSIDIARIES OF EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>KFx
Technology,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Operations,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company. </FONT></P>

Energy International,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy Asia Pacific Corp&#151;a Delaware company 96% owned by Evergreen Energy International,&nbsp;LLC </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy Asia Corporation&#151;a Japanese company 100% owned by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>C-Lock
Technology,&nbsp;Inc.&#151;a Delaware company 84% owned by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We consent to the incorporation by reference in Registration Statements on Form&nbsp;S-8 (Nos.&nbsp;333-09873, 333-82357,

reports dated March&nbsp;21, 2008 relating to the consolidated financial statements of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries (which report expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an
explanatory paragraph relating to the change in method of accounting for stock based compensation discussed in Note&nbsp;1 and an explanatory paragraph relating to the restatement discussed in
Note&nbsp;18), and the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over financial reporting (which report expresses an adverse opinion on the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over
financial reporting because of a material weakness) appearing in this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2007. </FONT></P>

<DESCRIPTION>EX-31.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#08ZAG13301_7">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT 31.1  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ta13302_certification_pursuant_to_sect__cer02454"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ta13302_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<BR>  SECTION&nbsp;302 OF<BR>  THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Kevin R. Collins, certify that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc.:
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of
operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
for the company and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating
to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance
regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and
procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Disclosed
in this report any change in the company's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the company's most recent fiscal quarter (the company's fourth
quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company's internal control over financial reporting; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>
</DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the company's auditors and the audit
committee of the company's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the
company's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the company's internal control over financial reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
<BR>

<TD WIDTH="49%" VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2>DIANA L. KUBIK</FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><HR NOSHADE><FONT SIZE=2> Diana L. Kubik<BR>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit&nbsp;32.1  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="te13302_evergreen_energy_inc._certific__eve04647"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_te13302_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.    <BR>    <BR>    CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<BR>  AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906<BR>  OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Kevin R. Collins, state and attest that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
am the Chief Executive Officer of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. (the "Issuer"),
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Accompanying
this certification is the Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2007, a periodic report (the "Periodic Report") filed by the Issuer with the
Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the "Exchange Act"), which contains financial statements.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that based on my knowledge:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the
Periodic Report containing the financial statements fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Exchange Act; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the
information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Issuer for the periods
presented therein. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
<BR>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>F-1</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2184008",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="11",CHK=650871,FOLIO='F-1',FILE='DISK127:[08ZAG1.08ZAG13301]GC13301A.;15',USER='ABEAULI',CD='21-MAR-2008;14:17' -->
<!-- THIS IS THE END OF A COMPOSITION COMPONENT -->

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_ge13301_1_2"> </A>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<A NAME="ge13301_report_of_independent___ge102230"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ge13301_1"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>To
the Membership Interest Owners of<BR>
Evergreen Operations,&nbsp;LLC<BR>
Denver, Colorado </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We
have audited the accompanying consolidated balance sheets of Evergreen Operations,&nbsp;LLC. and subsidiaries (the "Company") (a wholly-owned subsidiary of Evergreen Energy Inc) as
of December&nbsp;31, 2007 and 2006, and the related statements of income, members' deficit, and cash flows for the years then ended. These financial statements are the responsibility of the
Company's management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion on these financial statements based on our audits. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We
conducted our audits in accordance with auditing standards generally accepted in the United States of America. Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain
reasonable assurance about whether the financial statements are free of material misstatement. An audit includes consideration of internal control over financial reporting as a basis for designing
audit procedures that are appropriate in the circumstances, but not for the purpose of expressing an opinion on the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over financial reporting.
Accordingly, we express no such opinion. An audit also includes examining, on a test basis, evidence supporting the amounts and disclosures in the financial statements, assessing the accounting
principles used and significant estimates made by management, as well as evaluating the overall financial statement presentation. We believe that our audits provide a reasonable basis for our opinion. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
our opinion, such consolidated financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the financial position of Evergreen Operations,&nbsp;LLC and subsidiaries as of
December&nbsp;31, 2007 and 2006, and the results of their operations and their cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2007, in conformity with accounting
principles generally accepted in the United States of America. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As
discussed in Note&nbsp;1, the accompanying consolidated financial statements may not necessarily be indicative of the conditions that would have existed or the results of operations
if the Company had been operated as an unaffiliated entity. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Deloitte&nbsp;&amp;
Touche&nbsp;LLP<BR>
Denver, Colorado<BR>
March&nbsp;21, 2008 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>F-2</FONT></P>

NAME="page_gk13301_1_7"> </A>
